column5: Anyone know of any resorts open in November that aren't on the Bay of Quinte? I know it's a shot in the dark.
Because I have been there a few times and want to try something new.  Any suggestions welcome.
Barrie Ontario Canada.  There are many hotels.  fish for huge smallies.  No place I would rather be.

Quite a few lodges and resorts cater to hunters that time, maybe look for places that offer hunting packages in the fall once fishing is wound down. Think there's a few Kawartha, St Lawrence River and Lake St Clair resorts with duck hunting packages, might be a good bet.
You could try here.  www.pinevista.com  nice resort on Stony in the Kawarthas, which is open year round.
